page.title: 15VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: {Oughtibridge Gala}is held every year in Coronation Park.A parade of floats goes round the village and a prize is awarded for the best dressed float. A gala princess is elected and rides through the village.Stalls sell cakes, plants and crafts, and competitions are held for various activities. Each year a garden party is held in the vicarage at Oughtibridge. {The Wharncliffe Chase}is a run uphill through Wharncliffe Woods finishing in Coronation Park, it is approx. 3 mile and is held annually.
